sections.body:
Before Combat The mystic theurge casts barkskin, freedom of movement, and pass without trace.

During Combat While aiding her companions with bardic performance, the mystic theurge harasses her opponents with call lightning, charm monster, and wind wall.

Base Statistics Without barkskin, the mystic theurge's statistics are

AC 21, touch 17, flat-footed 17.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: Using a mix of rousing oratory, song, and thunderous spells, a sound warrior is often heard before she's seen.

sections.url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Prestige Class NPCs/Mystic Theurge/Mystic Theurges/Sound Warrior/Rindra Thunderpath

sections.body: Rindra always loved loud noises and the jolt of surprise they caused to those around her. She sought out ways to make more and bigger noises, and eventually turned to magic so she could call down cacophonous thunder anytime she wanted to. She prefers the sounds of storms and beasts over those of the cities, so she lives out in the wild.
Rindra protects many canyons and mountain passes, and loves how the noises from her thunderous spells bounce off the stone walls.
Rindra speaks loudly and forcefully, often stomping her feet for emphasis or letting out a surprisingly powerful belly laugh.
